text: Steve or Steven Ryan may refer to: ==Sportsmen== * Steve Ryan (soccer) (born 1956), American soccer player * Steve Ryan (American football), American football coach in the United States * Steve Ryan, curler in the 2014 Newfoundland and Labrador Tankard ==Others== * Steve Ryan (actor) (1947–2007), American actor * Steve Ryan (author) (born 1949), American author * Steve Ryan, candidate in the 1985 Ontario general election ==See also== * Stephen Ryan (disambiguation)
title: Steve Ryan
